metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16137 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: The debug module is vulnerable to regular expression denial of service when untrusted user input is passed into the o formatter. It takes around 50k characters to block for 2 seconds making this a low severity issue.

criterions.comment: node-debug: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
